TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsItem extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: 表示包含短语或用户可以调用产生成功的识别的其他实体的语法元素。

span.span: Represents a grammar element that contains phrases or other entities that a user can speak to produce a successful recognition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象可以如包含短语，实体对象、 逻辑组合的短语和对象，依次类推。An object can consist of phrases, entities such as objects, logical combinations of phrases and objects, and so on. 你可以使用属性类来访问的构成部分对象。You can use the property on the class to gain access to the constituents of an object. 顺序对象会显示在给定对象指定在其中，用户必须说出的顺序。The order in which objects appear in a given object specifies the order in which a user must speak them. 默认情况下，内容必须一次读出。By default, the contents of an must be spoken exactly once. 若要指定的内容必须是说出重复，使用构造函数和组`repeatCount`参数。To specify that the contents of an must be spoken repeatedly, use the constructor and set the `repeatCount` parameter. 同样，若要指定的数的范围的次数可以说，创建与设置的构造函数之一属性和属性。Similarly, to specify a range for the number of times that an can be spoken, create the with one of the constructors that set the property and the property. 如果已存在，你可以使用之一或方法以指定重复一次。If the already exists, you can use one of the or the methods to specify repeats. 你还可以指定一个项将重复使用通过设置的值的概率属性。You can also specify the probability that an item will be repeatedly spoken by setting the value of the property. 对象内对象构成从中用户可以说出一个替代项的列表。 objects within an object comprise a list of alternatives from which the user can speak one. 你可以使用属性指定将使用列表中的给定的项的可能性。You can use the property to specify the likelihood that a given item in the list will be spoken. 类表示`item`World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 中定义的元素[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761)。The class represents the `item` element that is defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761). 璝惠 SRGS`item`元素以及它支持通过 System.Speech，有关详细信息请参阅[项元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10cba7dd-994e-4aa7-907e-0669e5467d60)。For information about the SRGS `item` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [item Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/10cba7dd-994e-4aa7-907e-0669e5467d60).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置此属性，使用方法。To set this property, use the method. 此属性表示的一部分`repeat`由万维网联合会 (W3C) 定义特性[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/)。This property represents a portion of the `repeat` attribute defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将会重复此 实例内容的可能性。

span.span: The probability, as a floating point value, that the contents of this item will be repeatedly spoken.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅适用于项其和属性已显式设置为非默认值，通过构造函数或方法。The property applies only to items whose and properties have been explicitly set to non-default values, either by a constructor for or by the method.

exception.span: 尝试设置 为负或大于 1.0 的值。

span.span: An attempt is made to set to a value that is negative or larger than 1.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float Weight { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可以调整 对象中的 将会被朗读的可能性的倍数因子。

span.span: Gets or sets a multiplying factor that adjusts the likelihood that an in a object will be spoken.

value.span: 调整要拼写此项的可能性的浮点值。

span.span: A floating point value that adjusts the likelihood of this item being spoken.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 1.0，这等同于项无权重。The default value of this property is 1.0, which is equivalent to no weighting of the item. 大于 1.0 的权重明确 biases 将说出项，并小于 1.0 的权重产生负面 biases 项将要朗读的可能性越小的可能性。A weight greater than 1.0 positively biases the likelihood that the item will be spoken, and a weight less than 1.0 negatively biases the likelihood that the item will be spoken. 此属性是仅与对象内实例; 它将在所有其他情况下被忽略。This property is relevant only to objects within an instance; it is ignored in all other cases.

exception.span: 尝试将 设置为负值。

span.span: An attempt is made to set to a negative value.
